title: The effects of perceived therapist guidance and advice on adherence to home-based exercise programs in mothers of children with cerebral palsy in Rwanda
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Japhet Niyonsenga, Liliane Uwingeneye, Inès Musabyemariya, Jean Pierre Nteziryayo, Thèodat Siboyintore, Jean Baptiste Sagahutu, Francesca Cavallini, Rutembesa Eugene, Stefan Jansen, Nadia Monacelli, Luca Caricati, Jean Mutabaruka
